scripts.createCss: ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --source-map true Resources/Private/Scss/Gamification.scss Resources/Public/Css/gamification.css; ./node_modules/.bin/postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' Resources/Public/Css/gamification.css -o Resources/Public/Css/gamification.css
scripts.createJs: npm run lintJs && npm run babel
scripts.devAll: npm run createCss && npm run createJs
